plot outline: Kumar makes a trip to Pondicherry from Chennai for his bachelor's party along with his friend, Balaji in his fiancée Priya's car. Having just come off a break-up with Nancy, he tries his best to stay out of contact with her as well but in vain. However, things do not go according to plan on the trip back from Pondicherry.
title: Kadavul Irukaan Kumaru
plot: On the way back from his bachelor's party, Kumar and his best friend, Balaji, get caught smuggling liquor. What follows are their hilarious attempts to get to the wedding in time.

Kumar makes a trip to Pondicherry from Chennai for his bachelor's party along with his friend, Balaji in his fiancée Priya's car. Having just come off a break-up with Nancy, he tries his best to stay out of contact with her as well but in vain. However, things do not go according to plan on the trip back from Pondicherry.::PipingHotViews
